release.description: This release of the Transport Service is a component of the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated Windows System Properties Install Guide.

release.description: This release of the Transport Service is a component of the integrated release 6.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Initial version of the transport-upload component based on the Java 6 EE file upload servlet example.
